ygData.subject: Re: divine aura and gating?
ygData.msgSnippet: I just got divine barrier. It seems like you should keep divine barrier and divine aura both memorized, and do divine barrier first, and then if it expires and
ygData.messageBody:
I just got divine barrier. It seems like you should keep divine barrier and
divine aura both memorized, and do divine barrier first, and then if it
expires and you still need more fleeing time hit divine aura. Is that what
people do?


----- Original Message -----
From: Twylork <twylork@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 25, 1999 2:33 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] divine aura and gating?


> From: "Twylork" <twylork@...>
>
> No you cant.
>
> Also you can be stunned.
>
> But is a superb lifesaver never leave home without it and also when all is
> bad and your party gets descended on cast an area effect spell and then
just
> keep casting till it goes off and try to zone (hopefully you are sowed).
Ok
> if you die the party will have survived as all those not being attacked
will
> be on you but 9 times out of 10 I get the party out of jail when someone
has
> dropped a train into an already delicate situation.
>
> Apart from the party situaiton gives you a chance when a giant or other
> toughie is on you or indeed any situation goes bad..the first one is
> desperation ok and you do need to be close ..
>
> It is a quick casting spell though..anyway I digress all you asked was can
> you and the answer is no...shame real shame
>
> P.s. and has been said stun is a real bummer it gets through; dont try
> version one when there are alot of 'stunners' in the group.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Rose <rliu@...>
> To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, August 25, 1999 9:07 PM
> Subject: [EQ-Clerics] divine aura and gating?
>
>
> > From: "Rose" <rliu@...>
> >
> > Can this be done? Can u cast divine aura and then gate? I have yet to
> try
> > because I'm always too busy running when I feel the need to cast divine
> > aura...and end up dying anyway >:(
> >
> > -Imogen
